about_the_game:
8minSurvival!!


A Battle of Magic and Survival in the Darkness

In this game, you take on the role of Satachi, a character who can wield magic. Your objective is to survive for 8 minutes while escaping from a mysterious life form known as Bobo, all in complete darkness. It’s a top-down shooting game where strategy and quick reflexes are key.

Features:

Top-Down Shooting: Engage in strategic shooting action from a bird’s-eye view, anticipating enemy movements and striking back.
Magic System: Master Satachi’s diverse magical abilities to fend off enemies.
Survival Elements: As time and darkness become your foes, manage resources and make critical decisions to stay alive.

The World You’ll Experience:

Tension in the Dark: Intense gameplay where limited visibility heightens the suspense.
The Unique Enemy ‘Bobo’: Outwit the unpredictable movements of Bobo in your quest for survival.

8minSurvival!!

is not just another shooting game.
It’s a new challenge of survival in the dark,
waiting for players to brave the unknown terrors.
Join Satachi and confront the fears that lurk in the shadows.

name: 8minSurvival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: It is a top-down shooting game where you have to survive for 8 minutes from pursuing enemies to clear the game.
